video.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
video.synopsis: When a prison ship crash unleashes hundreds of Decepticons on Earth, Bumblebee leads a new Autobot force to protect humankind.

episodes.synopsis: A strange subspace message leads Bumblebee and a motley crew of Autobots back to Earth, which is about to be overrun with Decepticons.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As metal-eating Decepticon Underbite demolishes Crown City, Bumblebee tries to get his team of Autobots to work together.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bumblebee's bunch of Autobots must learn how to work together as a team while doing battle with the Sharkticon Hammerstrike and wolflike Steeljaw.
episodes.title: Trust Exercises

episodes.synopsis: Fixit finally gets a chance to fight alongside the members of Bee Team, but finds he may not be as prepared as he thought.
episodes.title: More Than Meets the Eye

episodes.synopsis: Human scientists discover evidence of the Decepticon presence, and Bumblebee struggles with his leadership role while his team battles Terrashock.
episodes.title: W.W.O.D.?

episodes.synopsis: While hunting for Thunderhoof, a Decepticon using humanity's folklore against itself, Bumblebee comes to question Sideswipe's allegiance.
episodes.title: As the Kospego Commands

episodes.synopsis: The Bee Team launches a rescue operation when Filch, a birdlike Decepticon with a love of shiny things, abducts Denny.
episodes.title: Collect 'Em All

episodes.synopsis: When Grimlock starts behaving aggressively toward members of the Bee Team, they learn that a tiny Decepticon has taken over his mind and body.
episodes.title: True Colors

episodes.synopsis: On her first solo mission, Strongarm pursues Springload, a deranged Amphiboid Decepticon, to the ruins of an ancient temple.
episodes.title: Rumble in the Jungle

episodes.synopsis: While playing host to Autobot legend Jazz, Bumblebee's team faces Ped, an enormous Bot-worm determined to deplete the Energon supply.
episodes.title: Can You Dig It?

episodes.synopsis: When a Decepticon toxin causes Bumblebee to regress to childhood, the Autobots must hunt a fugitive while baby-sitting their leader.
episodes.title: Adventures in Bumblebee-Sitting!

episodes.synopsis: Bumblebee's team is confronted by two rival bounty hunters, both of whom are out to claim the price on Bumblebee's head.
episodes.title: Hunting Season

episodes.synopsis: As the Bee Team confronts the smelly Malodor and his Skunkticons, Optimus is put through a perilous test of his abilities in the realm of the Primes.
episodes.title: Out of Focus

episodes.synopsis: Sideswipe blackmails Strongarm into staying behind while the Bee Team pursues crablike Decepticon Clampdown, who wants to join Steeljaw.
episodes.title: Sideways

episodes.synopsis: Nightstrike, a batlike Decepticon, captures Denny and the Autobots, holding them captive and subjecting them to their worst fears.
episodes.title: Even Robots Have Nightmares

episodes.synopsis: When Vertebreak captures Sideswipe and puts his head in a jar, he learns that he can still contribute to Bee Team.
episodes.title: Some Body, Any Body

episodes.synopsis: A feud with his sensei, Drift, prompts Jetstorm to return to Earth to continue his training with Russell as his new teacher.
episodes.title: One of Our Mini-Cons Is Missing

episodes.synopsis: As Bumblebee's team confronts undersea Decepticon Octopunch, Grimlock hopes to keep a serious injury from threatening the mission.
episodes.title: Deep Trouble

episodes.synopsis: When Decepticons Groundpounder and Headlock scheme to enter a human demolition derby, Grimlock, Denny and Fixit go undercover to even the odds.
episodes.title: The Champ

episodes.synopsis: The Autobots try to repair Fixit, but only end up turning him into a killing machine that mistakes the Bee Team for fugitive Decepticons.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Fixit

episodes.synopsis: Bumbleebee and his team must get back in to the Scrapyard, which Steeljaw's crew has overrun while they were away.
episodes.title: Lock Out

episodes.synopsis: Dinobot leader Grimlock faces a crisis of conscience when Scowl, a Dinobot with a mean streak, goes on a spree of destruction.
episodes.title: Similarly Different

episodes.synopsis: When Zizza, a queen bee Decepticon with mind control powers, seizes an airport, Bumblebee's team joins forces with fellow Autobot Windblade.
episodes.title: The Buzz on Windblade

episodes.synopsis: On a sightseeing visit to an Old West ghost town, the Bee team encounters Pseudo, a Decepticon with the power to change its shape.
episodes.title: Ghosts and Imposters

episodes.synopsis: As Steeljaw plans to teleport Megatronus, the first Decepticon, to Earth, Optimus Prime prepares his own return to protect the planet.
episodes.title: Battlegrounds: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Bumblebee and his team reunite with Optimus Prime to prevent Megatronus from destroying both Earth and Cybertron.
episodes.title: Battlegrounds: Part 2
